about.heading: About Compress PDF
about.description: Welcome to Online Compress PDF, your go-to solution for efficient and high-quality PDF compression. Whether you're a professional handling large reports, a student submitting assignments, or a small business owner archiving documents, we are here to simplify your PDF management process.

sectionOne.title: What is Our Mission?
sectionOne.description: At Compress PDF, our mission is to simplify the management of PDF files by providing a user-friendly and efficient tool for compressing PDFs. We understand that large PDF files can be cumbersome, whether you're sharing documents via email, uploading to websites, or simply trying to save storage space. Our goal is to offer a seamless, accessible solution that enhances your productivity and convenience, allowing you to handle your PDF files with ease.

sectionTwo.title: What Do We Offer?
sectionTwo.description: We offer a comprehensive suite of features designed to meet all your PDF compression needs:

items.title: Multiple Upload Systems
items.description: Easily upload your files from your device, cloud storage, or drag-and-drop directly onto our platform.

items.title: Flexible Download Methods
items.description: Once your PDF is compressed, download it through various options tailored to your preferences.

items.title: Online Sharing and Printing
items.description: Share your compressed PDFs directly through email or social media and print them with just a few clicks.

items.title: Customization Features
items.description: Adjust compression settings to balance quality and file size according to your specific requirements.

sectionThree.title: Our Team Members
sectionThree.description: Our team is a diverse group of dedicated professionals passionate about technology and user experience. From software developers and designers to customer support specialists, each member brings expertise and enthusiasm to the table. We are committed to continually improving our tool and ensuring it meets your needs with the highest standards of performance and reliability.

sectionFour.title: Why Choose Us?
sectionFour.description: Choosing Compress PDF means opting for a reliable, intuitive, and cost-free solution to your PDF compression needs. Here’s why we stand out:

items.title: Ease of Use
items.description: Our platform is designed with simplicity in mind, making it accessible to everyone, regardless of technical skill.

items.title: Customizable Options
items.description: Tailor the compression settings to your preferences to maintain the quality of your documents while reducing their size.

items.title: Fast and Efficient
items.description: Experience quick processing times and high-quality results with our advanced compression technology.

items.title: Secure and Reliable
items.description: Your files are handled with the utmost care, ensuring your data remains private and secure.

cookiePolicy.heading: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.description: At CompressPDF.to, operated by Softeko, we currently do not use cookies for advertising or similar purposes. However, this Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them in our current setup, and how we might use them in the future if we implement advertising or other features that require cookies.

sectionOne.heading: 1. What Are Cookies?
sectionOne.descriptionOne: Cookies are small text files placed on your device (computer, smartphone, tablet) by websites you visit. They help websites remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.
sectionOne.descriptionTwo: There are several types of cookies, including:
list: Session Cookies: Temporary cookies that are erased when you close your browser. They help track your session while you navigate through our Site.
Persistent Cookies: These remain on your device for a set period or until you delete them. They help remember your preferences and settings for future visits.

sectionTwo.heading: 2. Current Use of Cookies
sectionTwo.descriptionOne: We currently use essential cookies that are necessary for the basic functionality of our Site. These cookies enable you to navigate the Site and use its features, such as file uploading and downloading.
sectionTwo.descriptionTwo: As of now, we do not use cookies to collect performance or functional data. We do not track your browsing behavior or remember preferences beyond what is required for essential functionality.

sectionThree.heading: 3. Future Use of Cookies
sectionThree.descriptionOne: In the future, we may introduce advertising or other features that might require the use of additional cookies. If we do, we will update this Cookie Policy to reflect the changes and provide information on how these cookies will be used.
sectionThree.descriptionTwo: If we begin using cookies for purposes beyond the current essential functionality, we will revise this Cookie Policy to include details on the types of cookies used, their purposes, and how you can manage your preferences.

sectionFour.heading: 4. Managing Cookies
sectionFour.descriptionOne: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to refuse or delete cookies. However, please note that blocking cookies may impact the functionality of our Site and your overall experience.
sectionFour.descriptionTwo: In the event that we start using third-party analytics or advertising services in the future, you will have the option to opt out of these cookies through the respective opt-out pages provided by those services.

sectionFive.heading: 5. Changes to This Cookie Policy
sectionFive.descriptionOne: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Any updates will be posted on this page with an updated effective date.

sectionSix.heading: 6. Contact Us
sectionSix.description: If you have any questions or concerns about this Cookie Policy or our use of cookies, please contact us at:
sectionSix.addressInfo: Softeko, Navana Newbury Place, Shobhanbag, Dhanmondi, Dhaka, Bangladesh

metaData.title: Cookie Policy | CompressPDF
metaData.description: Understand CompressPDF's cookie usage. Learn about essential cookies, potential future uses, and how to manage your preferences for a transparent browsing experience.

termsAndConditions.heading: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.description: Welcome to CompressPDF.to, operated by Softeko. These Terms and Conditions (Terms) govern your use of our website located at https://compresspdf.to/ (the Site). By accessing or using our Site, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with these Terms, please do not use our Site.

sectionOne.heading: 1. Use of the Site
sectionOne.descriptionOne: CompressPDF.to provides a service to compress PDF files. By uploading PDF files to our Site, you agree to use the service solely for personal or business purposes and not for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.
sectionOne.descriptionTwo: You do not need to create an account to use our file compression service. However, you must be at least 13 years old to use our Site.

sectionTwo.heading: 2. User Responsibilities
sectionTwo.descriptionOne: You are solely responsible for the content of the files you upload to our Site. By uploading files, you represent and warrant that you have the right to do so and that the files do not violate any laws or third-party rights.
sectionTwo.descriptionTwo: You must not upload files that contain illegal content, including but not limited to, viruses, malware, or content that is defamatory, obscene, or otherwise objectionable.

sectionThree.heading: 3. Data Storage and Privacy
sectionThree.descriptionOne: Files uploaded to our Site are stored for a maximum of 2 hours for processing. After this period, files are automatically deleted from our servers. We do not retain any personal data or files beyond this period.
sectionThree.descriptionTwo: Our handling of your data is governed by our Privacy Policy, which can be reviewed here. By using our Site, you agree to the terms of our Privacy Policy.

sectionFour.heading: 4. Intellectual Property
sectionFour.descriptionOne: All content, trademarks, and other intellectual property on our Site, including but not limited to text, graphics, and logos, are owned by or licensed to Softeko and are protected by applicable intellectual property laws.
sectionFour.descriptionTwo: You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to access and use the Site for its intended purpose. You may not copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works based on the Site or its content without our express written permission.

sectionFive.heading: 5. Limitation of Liability
sectionFive.descriptionOne: Our Site is provided on an as is and as available basis. We make no warranties or representations about the accuracy, reliability, or availability of the Site. To the extent permitted by law, we disclaim all warranties, express or implied, including but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose.
sectionFive.descriptionTwo: In no event shall Softeko or its affiliates be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or related to your use of the Site, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages. Our total liability for any claim arising out of your use of the Site shall not exceed the amount paid by you, if any, for accessing the Site.

sectionSix.heading: 6. Termination
sectionSix.descriptionOne: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to our Site at our sole discretion, without notice, if we believe you have violated these Terms or engaged in any behavior that could harm our Site or other users.

sectionSeven.heading: 7. Changes to Terms
sectionSeven.descriptionOne: We may update these Terms from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. Your continued use of the Site following the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of such changes.

sectionEight.heading: 8. Contact Us
sectionEight.description: If you have any questions or concerns about this Cookie Policy or our use of cookies, please contact us at:
sectionEight.addressInfo: Softeko, Navana Newbury Place, Shobhanbag, Dhanmondi, Dhaka, Bangladesh

privacyPolicy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: Welcome to CompressPDF.to, operated by Softeko. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website, located at https://compresspdf.to/ (the Site). Using our Site, you agree to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy.

sectionOne.heading: 1. Information We Collect
sectionOne.descriptionOne: When you use CompressPDF.to to compress PDF files, we collect the files you upload. These files are processed on our servers to perform the compression service.
sectionOne.descriptionTwo: We may collect data on how you interact with our Site, including your IP address, browser type, and access times. This information helps us improve our services and ensure the Site operates correctly.

sectionTwo.heading: 2. How We Use Your Information
sectionTwo.descriptionOne: The files you upload are primarily used to provide you with the requested compression service.
sectionTwo.descriptionTwo: We use this information to analyze and improve the functionality and performance of our Site. This data is used in aggregate form and does not identify individual users.

sectionThree.heading: 3. Data Storage and Retention
sectionThree.descriptionOne: Files you upload are temporarily stored on our servers for 2 hours. After this period, the files are automatically deleted from our servers.
sectionThree.descriptionTwo: We do not retain any personal data or files beyond the 2-hour processing period. Once deleted, the files are irretrievably removed from our servers.

sectionFour.heading: 4. Data Security
sectionFour.descriptionOne: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data during transmission and while stored on our servers. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is completely secure. While we strive to protect your data, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

sectionFive.heading: 5. Third-Party Services
sectionFive.descriptionOne: We do not share, sell, or disclose your files or personal information to third parties, except as required by law or to comply with legal processes.
sectionFive.descriptionTwo: Our Site may contain links to other websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these external sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit.

sectionSix.heading: 6. Changes to This Privacy Policy
sectionSix.descriptionOne: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. Your continued use of the Site following the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of such changes.

sectionSeven.heading: 7. Contact Us
sectionSeven.description: If you have any questions or concerns about this Cookie Policy or our use of cookies, please contact us at:
sectionSeven.addressInfo: Softeko, Navana Newbury Place, Shobhanbag, Dhanmondi, Dhaka, Bangladesh

metaData.title: Privacy Policy | CompressPDF
metaData.description: Learn how CompressPDF protects your data. Our privacy policy outlines file handling, data usage, security measures, and our commitment to your privacy.
